{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Lenovo |model=Newifi |revision=mini Y1 (R6830) |series=AC1200 |asin=B00R16WYQ4;CN; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Discontinued |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Wireless-AC1200 USB Router}} :[http://www.newifi.com/product_newifi_mini.shtml Product page] {{•}} [https://world.tmall.com/item/536896056717.htm Tmall page]
===Specifications=== * Product segment: AC1200 (867+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x external antenna * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5GHz * WAN: 1x FE; LAN: 2x FE ports * Power Supply: : AC Input : 110~240V (50/60Hz) : DC Output : 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions 130.2 x 128.8 x 26.6 mm (WxDxH)
===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_mini_y1 ''Lenovo Newifi mini Y1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi mini]]) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_y1s ''Lenovo Newifi Y1S'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 1]]) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 ''Lenovo Newifi D1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 2]]) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-team/d-team_newifi_d2 ''D-Team Newifi D2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 3]])
